main: ^I am Soren, an explorer seeking to cleanse the corruption from this temple and save its guardians.
^Ha! More foolhardy adventurers come to their doom.  You are no match for the power of the demon that has corrupted this temple.
^What demon? I am here to free the guardians from the corruption that plagues them.
^You are a fool. The demon has taken hold of the guardians and their protectors. Even now, its power flows through my veins.
^But you needn't worry about me. I will destroy you and anyone else who dares to stand in the demon's way.
^I won't let you harm anyone else. If you won't break free from the demon's hold, then I will free you with my blade.
